quotes: Hymas, Charles (8 July 2024). 'David Cameron to step back from frontline politics'. The Telegraph.

'David Cameron steps back from frontline politics – but keeps Lords seat for life'. The Independent. 8 July 2024. Retrieved 9 July 2024.

Archived from the original on 21 October 2013.

Archived from the original on 28 August 2016.
Retrieved 12 September 2016.

Archived from the original on 3 June 2016.
'Make people happier, says Cameron'. BBC News. 22 May 2006.
Archived from the original on 6 August 2016.

Archived from the original on 9 January 2006.
Retrieved 25 November 2006.

Archived from the original on 12 May 2021.
Retrieved 6 July 2014.
